title: SOLD: FS: lot of 19 low-grade T205s
author: gonzo

posts.post_title: SOLD: FS: lot of 19 low-grade T205s
posts.post_content:
List and scans below.
These cards are in rough condition, but several would present nicely in a binder.  They represent a mix of common backs.
Most have one or more of back damage/paper loss, heavy staining, creasing, trimming, and general hard wear.

Price is $SOLD via PayPal f/f, shipping included.
Not looking to break the lot up.

"I'll take it" takes precedence over ongoing negotiations.

PM here or email to mpg1972 (at) gmail[dot]com
